org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.api

Interface IRecipeMatcher<M extends IMachine,R extends IRecipe>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - The machine type.
    R - The recipe type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecipeMatcher, RecipePropertyMatcher

    public interface IRecipeMatcher<M extends IMachine,R extends IRecipe>
    /** Helper class to abstract away some function logic (lambdas would make this way simpler though). It allows you to define a matching criteria and allows you to filter out recipe that match these criteria and those that do not. You do this by implementing the matches() method, which should return true when the criteria of the given recipe are met, or false otherwise.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IRecipeMatch<M,R> findRecipe(ISuperRecipeRegistry superRecipeRegistry)
      Find the recipe.
      java.util.List<IRecipeMatch<M,R>> findRecipes(ISuperRecipeRegistry superRecipeRegistry)
      Find all the recipes.
      boolean matches(M machine, R recipeToMatch)
      If the given recipe can be created in the given machine.

    • Method Detail

        If the given recipe can be created in the given machine.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
